title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
August 4, 2020
On Tuesday, August 4, 2020, the President signed into law:H.R. 1957, the “Great American Outdoors Act,” which establishes the National Park and Public Land Legacy Restoration Fund and provides permanent funding for the Land and Water Conservation Fund.
